statements: DELETE FROM children_health_records WHERE parent_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM children_health_records WHERE parent_name = 'John Doe' AND vaccination_records->'MMR'->>'date' = '2022-01-15';

DELETE FROM Vaccinations WHERE child_id = 100 AND vaccine_name = 'MMR';
DELETE FROM addresses WHERE city = 'New York';
